name: Beeellll
greetingText: I really like your name btw!, It's like a constellation, each letter a shining star.
wishText: happy birthday abeng!, may your birthday be filled with smiles, and suprises! may all your wishes come true! -sincerely, bubun
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! wish u all the best bla bla bla blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.[be honest plz]
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
